name: Uyghur Music
description: Music of the Uyghur people native to Xinjiang in western China.

children.name: Bayawan
children.description: Distinct muqam tradition of the Dolan subgroup of the Uyghur people, often considered the wildest of the regional muqam variations.

children.name: Twelve Muqam
children.description: Uyghur muqam suite of 12 different muqam performances, originating in Southern Xinjiang.
